# backFaceStencil

**Instance Property**

The stencil descriptor for back-facing primitives.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var backFaceStencil: MTLStencilDescriptor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is `nil`, which indicates the stencil test is disabled for the back-facing primitives. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLStencilDescriptor].

## Specifying stencil descriptors for primitives

- **frontFaceStencil**: The stencil descriptor for front-facing primitives.
